item.title: 关税前置推动加美贸易顺差创新高
item.description: 加拿大对美国的汽车、汽车零部件和石油出口创下新纪录，帮助这个北方国家实现了自 2022 年 5 月以来最大的总体贸易顺差。【原文：Canada’s exports to the US reached a fresh record on shipments of cars, auto parts and oil, helping the northern nation to post its largest overall trade surplus since May 2022.】

item.title: 尼日利亚将在 2026 年前将输电能力提高 1,500 兆瓦
item.description: 尼日利亚一位政府官员表示，在过去两年中，尼日利亚的输电能力几乎翻了一番，预计到 2026 年底，尼日利亚将再输电 1500 兆瓦。【原文：Nigeria expects to transmit an additional 1,500 megawatts of electricity by the end of 2026, after nearly doubling its transmission capacity in the past two years, a government official said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行再次降息，释放宽松阶段即将结束的信号
item.description: 欧洲中央银行自 6 月以来第六次降低利率，并表示随着通胀降温和经济消化地缘政治的剧烈变化，其降息阶段可能即将结束。【原文：The European Central Bank lowered interest rates for the sixth time since June and indicated that its cutting phase may be drawing to a close as inflation cools and the economy digests seismic shifts in geopolitics.】

item.title: 欧元反弹证明银行押注反对与美元平价
item.description: 欧元的飙升证明了那些反对单一货币跌至与美元平价的少数策略师的观点。【原文：The euro’s surge is vindicating the handful of strategists who argued against calls for the single currency to fall to parity with the dollar.】

item.title: 煤炭价格卷土重来，强劲需求与疲软供应相得益彰
item.description:
世界终将抛弃这种最脏的化石燃料，但其近期的受欢迎程度似乎已得到保证。【原文：

The world will eventually ditch the dirtiest fossil fuel, but its near-term popularity seems assured.

item.title: 特朗普关税对全球汇率的影响
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）颁布一个世纪以来最大规模的美国关税增税措施，每天7.5万亿美元的货币市场已成为投资者关注的焦点。不断变化的全球贸易模式会影响经济增长和通货膨胀的前景，进而影响汇率。以下是其运作原理。【原文：The $7.5 trillion-a-day currency market has become a focal point for investors as President Donald Trump enacts the biggest US tariff increases in a century. Changing global trade patterns affect the outlook for growth and inflation, which in turn can impact exchange rates. Here’s how it all works.】

item.title: 美国雇主宣布裁员数量创 2020 年以来之最
item.description: 美国雇主在 2 月份宣布了裁员计划，裁员速度是自大流行病初期以来最快的，其中以政府部门的裁员为首，因为特朗普政府正着手缩减联邦工作人员。【原文：US employers in February announced plans to reduce headcount at the fastest pace since early in the pandemic, led by cuts in the government sector as the Trump administration moved to shrink the federal workforce.】

item.title: 瑞银：欧盟国防统一有望解除欧元储备地位
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）旗下瑞银投资银行（UBS Investment Bank）的分析师表示，随着欧洲在为自身国防提供资金的必要性问题上日益团结一致，欧元随时准备从世界各国央行对储备货币的任何重新评估中获益。【原文：The euro stands ready to benefit from any reassessment of reserve currencies by the world’s central banks as Europe grows more united over the need to fund its own defense, according to analysts at UBS Investment Bank, a unit of UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 西班牙电信任命前西班牙主管为首席运营官
item.description: Telefonica SA 董事会周四任命埃米利奥-加约（Emilio Gayo）为新任首席运营官，接替任职八年的安吉尔-维拉（Angel Vila）。【原文：Telefonica SA’s board on Thursday named Emilio Gayo as its new chief operating officer to replace Angel Vila, who held the role for eight years.】

item.title: 中国商务部长上月致信美国寻求对话
item.description: 中国最高贸易官员表示，他一直在努力与美国建立沟通渠道，就解决双边贸易争端展开会谈。【原文：China’s top trade official said he’s been trying to establish a communication channel with the US to start talks on resolving bilateral trade disputes.】

item.title: 乌克兰提高利率，警告将进一步加息以抑制通胀
item.description: 乌克兰中央银行在第三次会议上收紧了货币政策，并表示准备采取更多行动来抑制战时经济中加速的通货膨胀。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank tightened monetary policy for a third meeting and said it’s ready to take more action to tame an acceleration in inflation in the war-time economy.】

item.title: 一年一度的航运业聚会转变为探讨特朗普贸易战的论坛
item.description: 本周，来自 50 个国家的约 4400 名航运业高管、零售商和供应链经理齐聚加利福尼亚州长滩，参加由 S&P Global 公司主办的 TPM — 会议。【原文：About 4,400 shipping executives, retailers and supply chain managers from 50 countries gathered in Long Beach, California, this week for TPM — now in its 25th year and hosted by S&P Global.】

item.description: 家得宝公司（Home Depot Inc.【原文：Home Depot Inc. is betting on generative AI to improve online shopping — part of the big-box retailer’s efforts to revive sales and get back to steady growth.】

item.title: 海湾皇家公司启动商业园，押注阿联酋办公物业
item.description: 由沙特阿拉伯王子阿尔瓦利德-本-塔拉勒（Alwaleed bin Talal）之子和沙迦统治家族成员创建的房地产公司 Arada Developments 已获得一份价值 6.04 亿迪拉姆（1.64 亿美元）的合同，将在沙迦酋长国建设一个商业区的第一期工程。【原文：Arada Developments, a property firm founded by the son of Saudi Arabia’s Prince Alwaleed bin Talal and a member of Sharjah’s ruling family, has awarded a 604 million dirham ($164 million) contract to build the first phase of a business district in the emirate of Sharjah.】

item.title: 德国电网拥堵成本下降减轻消费者负担
item.description: 德国电网干预费去年下降了约 16%，原因是进行了投资，以更好地处理可再生能源流和降低价格，从而减轻了转嫁给消费者的成本。【原文：German power-grid intervention fees dropped about 16% last year following investments to better handle renewable energy flows and lower prices, easing costs passed onto consumers.】

item.title: 人工智能热情高涨，中国加大对科技行业的支持力度
item.description: 随着人工智能领域的快速发展，中国正计划加大对科技公司的支持力度。【原文：China is planning to increase support for its technology companies as the sector makes rapid advances in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 南非盗猎犀牛案件降至 2020 年以来最低点
item.description: 去年，南非非法猎杀犀牛的数量降至 2020 年以来的最低点，因为这个犀牛最集中的省份报告的偷猎事件有所减少。【原文：The number of rhinos killed illegally in South Africa declined to the lowest since 2020 last year after the province with the greatest concentration of the animals reported fewer poaching incidents.】

item.title: Just Eat 在都柏林推出自主无人机送餐服务
item.description: 都柏林的 Just Eat Takeaway.com 客户现在可以使用自动无人机送餐，这为传统上依赖临时工的行业向自动化迈出了一步。【原文：Just Eat Takeaway.com customers in Dublin can now have food delivered by autonomous drone, taking a step toward automation in an industry traditionally dependent on gig economy workers.】

item.title: 莫桑比克政治局势紧张，国际货币基金组织（IMF）协议仍遥遥无期，莫桑比克债券暴跌
item.description: 在政治暴力和国际货币基金组织协议悬而未决的不确定性影响下，莫桑比克的美元债券连续第六天下跌。【原文：Mozambique’s dollar bonds fell for a sixth straight day amid political violence and uncertainty over over a pending International Monetary Fund deal.】

item.title: 德意志银行接近达成与 70 亿美元企业贷款相关的 SRT 交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）正在出售一项与 70 亿美元企业贷款组合相关的重大风险转移。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is selling a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of $7 billion of corporate loans, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 矿商肯玛尔公司反驳前高管的收购企图
item.description: Kenmare Resources Plc 股价大涨 50%以上，因为这家钛矿生产商拒绝了一名前高管提出的高溢价收购要约。【原文：Kenmare Resources Plc shares surged by more than 50% after the titanium minerals producer rebuffed a takeover offer made by a former executive at a hefty premium.】

item.title: 土耳其连续第三次下调关键利率至 42.5%
item.description: 在通胀数据显示降温速度快于预期之后几天，土耳其央行连续第三次下调了关键利率。【原文：Turkey’s central bank lowered its key interest rate for a third straight time, days after inflation data showed a faster-than-expected pace of cooling.】

item.title: 欧盟新碳市场将通过家庭取暖价格飙升削减二氧化碳排放量
item.description: 据研究机构 BloombergNEF 称，欧盟针对运输和天然气取暖的新碳市场将使家庭成本在本十年末飙升。【原文：A new European Union carbon market for transportation and gas-fired heating is set to send household costs soaring by the end of the decade, according to researcher BloombergNEF.】

item.title: 迪拜阿联酋国民银行（Emirates NBD）通过 Digital Arm 推出加密货币交易
item.description: 迪拜最大的银行与数字资产公司 Aquanow 合作，开始通过其数字银行部门提供加密货币服务。【原文：The largest bank in Dubai has partnered with digital-assets firm Aquanow to start offering cryptocurrency services through its digital banking arm.】

item.title: 市场动荡推动低波动率股票跃居主导地位
item.description: 最近，由于担心美国关税对经济的影响，标准普尔 500 指数一路下跌，终于给了一个集团大显身手的机会。【原文：The recent rout in the S&P 500 driven by anxiety over US tariffs’ impact on the economy is finally giving one group its chance to shine.】

item.title: 美元微笑 "的创造者称美国货币未来将更加疲软
item.description: 随着美元下跌速度加快，长期看跌美元的 Stephen Jen 坚信，美元的困境才刚刚开始。【原文：As a decline in the dollar picks up speed, longtime bear Stephen Jen is convinced the US currency’s woes are only beginning.】
